text:
You just get in time to releave yourself. 
I hope no one listened...

You try to quickly open the door, but it jams! 
Someone has glued it tight from the outside! 

Try to find something that will get you out of there.

ChewGum? 
How that get in my pocket?

A pencil? 
That's not it either.

creditcard, keys, 
razorblade, 
coins, condom, glowes, 
my hands, comb...

Wait. 
Razorblade? 
You really think I'm gonna cut myself out of here with that? 
More like myself...

But there are keys. 
Maybe they will do.
